languages.text: Часть обезумевших затихает, другие пытаются прийти в чувство: кто-то прибивает кортиком свою руку к панели, не давая себе двигаться, кто-то неистово шепчет молитвы. Одни возвращаются к когитаторам, другие склоняются над раненными. Гремят выстрелы: тех, кто еще беснуется, Вольный Торговец казнит лично, как и обещал{mf||а}.

traits.locale_text: Часть обезумевших затихает, другие пытаются прийти в чувство: кто-то прибивает кортиком свою руку к панели, не давая себе двигаться, кто-то неистово шепчет молитвы. Одни возвращаются к когитаторам, другие склоняются над раненными. Гремят выстрелы: тех, кто еще беснуется, Вольный Торговец казнит лично, как и обещал{mf||а}.

languages.text: Some of the lunatics quiet down, others try to snap out of it — one pins her hand to a panel with a dagger to stop herself from moving, another fervently whispers prayers. Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.
languages.original_text: Часть обезумевших затихает, другие пытаются прийти в чувство: кто-то прибивает кортиком свою руку к панели, не давая себе двигаться, кто-то неистово шепчет молитвы. Одни возвращаются к когитаторам, другие склоняются над раненными. Гремят выстрелы: тех, кто еще беснуется, Вольный Торговец казнит лично, как и обещал{mf||а}.

traits.locale_text: Some of the lunatics quiet down, others are trying to snap out of it — one is pinning her hand to a panel with a dagger to stop herself from moving, another is fervently whispering prayers. Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are being executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are being executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

Some of the lunatics quiet down, others try to snap out of it — one pins her hand to a panel with a dagger to stop herself from moving, another fervently whispers prayers. Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

Some of the lunatics quiet down, others try to snap out of it — one pins her hand to a panel with a dagger to stop herself from moving, another fervently whispers prayers. Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

languages.text: Algunos de los lunáticos se callan y otros intentan recuperar la compostura. Una fija su mano a un panel usando una daga, mientras que otro reza fervientemente. Unos vuelven a los cogitadores y otros se inclinan sobre los heridos. Se oyen disparos: {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está cumpliendo su promesa y ejecutando a los rebeldes personalmente.
languages.original_text: Some of the lunatics quiet down, others try to snap out of it — one pins her hand to a panel with a dagger to stop herself from moving, another fervently whispers prayers. Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

traits.locale_text: Algunos de los lunáticos se callan y otros intentan recuperar la compostura. Una fija su mano a un panel usando una daga, mientras que otro reza fervientemente. Unos vuelven a los cogitadores y otros se inclinan sobre los heridos. Se oyen disparos: {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está cumpliendo su promesa y ejecutando a los rebeldes personalmente.

languages.text: 一部分疯子安静了下来，另一部分人试着强迫自己安静下来。其中一个人用匕首把自己的手钉在了面板上，防止自己到处乱跑，而另一个人狂热地低声祈祷着。一部分人回到了沉思者旁边，另一部分人照顾起了伤员。船舱里传来了枪声——那些仍然在发疯的人，被行商浪人{mf|亲手|亲手}枪毙。
languages.original_text: Some of the lunatics quiet down, others try to snap out of it — one pins her hand to a panel with a dagger to stop herself from moving, another fervently whispers prayers. Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

traits.locale_text: 一部分疯子安静了下来，另一部分人试着强迫自己安静下来。其中一个人用匕首把自己的手钉在了面板上，防止自己到处乱跑，而另一个人狂热地低声祈祷着。一部分人回到了思考器旁边，另一部分人照顾起了伤员。船舱里传来了枪声——那些仍然在发疯的人，被行商浪人{mf|亲手|亲手}枪毙。

languages.text: 狂人の中には静まる者もいれば、そこから抜け出そうとする者もいる。ある者は短剣で手をパネルへと刺し貫いて動きを止め、またある者は熱心に祈りをささやく。ある者は考算機の元に戻り、ある者は負傷者に寄りかかる。銃声が鳴り響き、まだ暴れている者は宣言どおりに自由開拓者の手で処刑された。
languages.original_text: Some of the lunatics quiet down, others try to snap out of it — one pins her hand to a panel with a dagger to stop herself from moving, another fervently whispers prayers. Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

traits.locale_text: 狂人の中には静まる者もいれば、そこから抜け出そうとする者もいる。ある者は短剣で手をパネルへと刺し貫いて動きを止め、またある者は熱心に祈りをささやく。ある者は考算機の元に戻り、ある者は負傷者に寄りかかる。銃声が鳴り響き、まだ暴れている者は宣言どおりに自由開拓者の手で処刑された。

languages.text: Einige der Verrückten beruhigen sich, andere versuchen, sich wieder aufzurappeln – eine klemmt ihre Hand mit einem Dolch an eine Tafel, um sich nicht zu bewegen, eine andere flüstert Gebete. Einige kehren zu den Cogitatoren zurück, andere beugen sich über die Verwundeten. Schüsse ertönen – diejenigen, die noch immer randalieren, werden wie angedroht {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin} selbst hingerichtet.
languages.original_text: Some of the lunatics quiet down, others try to snap out of it — one pins her hand to a panel with a dagger to stop herself from moving, another fervently whispers prayers. Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

languages.text: Quelques-uns des fous parviennent à retrouver leur calme, tandis que d'autres font de leur mieux pour se maîtriser : une femme s'immobilise en plantant une dague à travers sa main dans un panneau, quelqu'un d'autre murmure des prières ferventes. Certains retournent aux cogitateurs ou se penchent sur les blessés. Des coups de feu retentissent : mettant sa menace à exécution, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} abat ceux qui continuent à se montrer violents.
languages.original_text: Some of the lunatics quiet down, others try to snap out of it — one pins her hand to a panel with a dagger to stop herself from moving, another fervently whispers prayers. Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

traits.locale_text: Quelques-uns des fous parviennent à retrouver leur calme, tandis que d'autres font de leur mieux pour se maîtriser : une femme s'immobilise en plantant une dague à travers sa main dans un panneau, quelqu'un d'autre murmure des prières ferventes. Certains retournent aux cogitateurs ou se penchent sur les blessés. Des coups de feu retentissent : mettant sa menace à exécution, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} abat ceux qui continuent à se montrer violents.

languages.text: Delilerden kimi sessizleşiyor, kimi kendini toparlamaya çalışıyor. Biri elini hançerle bir panele tutturarak kendini hareketsiz kılıyor, bir diğeri ise hararetle dua ediyor. Bazıları kavramsayarlara dönüyor, bazısı yaralılarla ilgileniyor. Silah sesleri çınlıyor... Hâlâ yatışmamış olanlar, söz verdiği gibi bizzat Hür Tacir tarafından infaz ediliyor.
languages.original_text: Some of the lunatics quiet down, others try to snap out of it — one pins her hand to a panel with a dagger to stop herself from moving, another fervently whispers prayers. Some return to the cogitators, others lean over the wounded. Shots ring out — those still on a rampage are executed by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, as promised.

Bazıları kavramsayarlara dönüyor, bazısı yaralılarla ilgileniyor. Silah sesleri çınlıyor... Hâlâ yatışmamış olanlar, söz verdiği gibi bizzat Hür Tacir tarafından infaz ediliyor.
